    • Field Detail

      • offset

        protected int offset
        byte offset of the field

      • bitOffset

        protected int bitOffset
        the bit offset, will be 0 unless a bit(s) field

      • sizeInBytes

        protected int sizeInBytes
        Size of field in bytes. Will be 0 if the field is less than 1 byte (BitsField or BitField)

      • sizeInBits

        protected int sizeInBits
        Size of field in bits. Mutually exclusive with sizeInBytes. Will be 0 unless the field is a BitsField or BitField

      • units

        protected com.thesonofthom.tools.BufferMap.LengthUnits units
        Whether the field is a BIT field or a BYTE field

      • isReservedField

        protected boolean isReservedField
        Whether or not the field is marked as Reserved. Reserved fields do not print in toString(). Used in ReservedField and ReservedBitsField

    • Method Detail

      • bind

        protected final void bind(int size)
        bind the field to the internal array. Called either in the base constructor or in the subclass constructor once the size of the field is determined
        Parameters:
        size - - size of the field in either bytes or bits, depending on units setting
